a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ ARAD-ka {1}{d}PA-rem₂-an-ni lu DI-mu a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ ina UGU x x ša LUGAL EN-li iš-pur-an-ni ma a-ta-a a-du-na-kan-an-ni x x x x+x-tu₂ la tu-še-bi-li x x x x x x x x x-za-za x x x {LU₂}EN.NAM iq-ṭi₂-bi ma-a x x x-MEŠ-šu₂ še-ri-ba-a x x x ga-le-e-te še-ri-ba x x x x x {LU₂}ag-ru-te x x x x x x x x ga-le-e-te x x x x lu-sa-ni-qi₂ x x x x x šum₂-mu la šal-lim x x x {LU₂}EN-pi-qit-te-ia {LU₂}EN-pi-qit-te-ia e-pu-uš x x x u₂-ba-du-du a.a-ši LUGAL x x x x x+x LUGAL EN-li₂ a-na {1}{d}PA-EN-GIN-in liš-pu-ra x x x x-pa-ru lu la u₂-ba-du-du x x x x+x {LU₂}EN-pi-qit-te-ia {LU₂}EN-pi-qit-te-ia ina IGI {LU₂}ag-ru-te-šu₂ li-zi-zi
